name: Healthy In Dyckman Juice Bar & Cafe

reviews.text: Love Healthy in Dyckman. It‚Äôs a gem in the Kingsbridge area where it‚Äôs possible to find good quality, healthy food. I particularly love their healthy egg wrap and chai latte. The staff is very sweet, and the place clean. The food is on the pricier side compared to the area, but it does justice to the quality. Highly recommended!
The salmon rice bowl is everything üòÅ

I tried this spot for the first time and it was such a great experience. The staff are friendly and everything tasted so fresh and delicious. Also I noticed they have this gluten free arepa and I will definitely come back to try it.
Wonderful experience thank you so much Dylan for your customer service and knowledge
This is the best healthy place to eat ! The food is always fresh and I love the salmon and the chicken quesadillas. Everything is perfect here. I will always come back here.

Love this place! I usually get the salmon burger cause I love salmon. But at the same time I have a lot of preferences. So when asking them to take some stuff off or add somethings never seemed like it was a issue for them. The people are super nice and friendly and enjoy myself everytime I go. And the food alqays comes at a good time its never too long. :)
Excelente
Buenas comida , excelente lugar
The food‚Äôs great, there‚Äôs always a friendly cashier, and the cozy and familiar vibe is infectious
Friendly
Good food üòçüòçüòç
Great alternative in the Bronx, so many junk food out there but this place truly makes a big big difference.
Food is really good. Always a calm and welcome environment. Love the concept of the business.

Yuka fries. Stop playing. Smoothies, unique and delicious.  They have the quality and consistency every time. Everything I‚Äôve tasted is made with care. It makes no sense and the message on the cups.. divine üíØ‚ú® our neighborhoods need more places like this üôèüèº I pray your success‚Ä¶

I'm not usually picky so when my acai bowl was a little melty I was just going to brush it off but then I took a bite and something tasted off. Moldy old blueberries. I'm sure this place is good for other things because of the good reviews but watch out for the fruit!

Prefacing this with ive only had their coffee, not the food. The hot coffee was okay, but highly overpriced for the quality. The iced coffee was unfortunately undrinkable. Tasted like a pitcher of brewed coffee had been sitting on the back of their fridge for a week. I might try their food some day but its not on my rotation for coffee.

Great place to go for your produce goods.. this place had great customer service. They was very helpful. The store was super clean. Had such a fresh smell. Had some really good smoothies definitely have to try it out . Hands down  great place to go.
Excelente
The salad with chicken is amazing. That roast chicken is some of the most delicious EVER

Opciones para todos los gustos. Prote√≠na en version comida y smoothie. He ido un par de veces por desayuno y almuerzo. La quesadilla y los bowls cumplieron totalmente mis expectativas y 10/10 precios/calidad.
Lugar limpio y ordenado. Es un lugar donde puedes hacer tu homework en tu laptop ya que el lugar es tranquilo, m√∫sica agradable y tiene acceso an internet.
Love their smoothies & rice bowls 10/10 would recommend. Love to have a healthy spot in the neighborhood with so much variety.

I‚Äôve had a consistently frustrating experience with Health on Dyckman when it comes to pricing. The amount listed on the menu is never what I actually end up paying. The first time I visited over a year ago, I ordered a vegan sandwich and was surprised at the higher total at checkout. When I questioned it, a thin Hispanic guy behind the counter told me not to go by the menu prices because ‚Äúthey aren‚Äôt correct.‚Äù

Despite this, I gave them another chance‚Äîmostly because healthy food options in the area are limited. I ordered an a√ßa√≠ bowl three days in a row, and each day I was charged a different price. I was supposed to be paying $14, but the price kept creeping up until today, when I was told it was $20. At that point, I had enough and walked away.

It‚Äôs disappointing and honestly feels like they‚Äôre making up prices on the spot. I won‚Äôt be returning.

I had a fantastic experience at this healthy food spot today! I ordered an a√ßa√≠ bowl and it was absolutely delicious‚Äîfresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The portion was just right, and the price felt more than fair for the quality. It‚Äôs great to find a place that serves healthy options without compromising on taste. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back!

The customer services was amazing (they also speak Spanish)

Horrible experience I was the only person there and they forgot to make my order I had to remind them after 20 mins of waiting during my lunch break from work. They clearly don‚Äôt care about the customer experience or making money do not come here!!!!!
I ordered the chicken wrap. The chicken was extremely hard, overcooked and had no flavor. The lettuce was soggy. I also asked for a spinach wrap and was given a wheat wrap. Completely overpriced.
Ordered a 15 dollar chicken avocado wrap. No avocado, barely any chicken, loaded with mostly lettuce. Will not be back.
Clean and usually great customer service.

I ordered a vegan tuna wrap and cortado with oat milk. Both were delicious. I nearly finished my meal before I realized I wanted to share a review and photo. It was a pleasant surprise finding this place.
Hours are not accurate it‚Äôs now 8:30 lights are off now it‚Äôs 8:50 and it‚Äôs still closed
Delicious smoothies but every time I order pick up, the order isn‚Äôt ready. I order well in advance, I arrive to the store and it‚Äôs always a waiting game.
Guy was super friendly it was amazing!
THE MALE WORKER THIN HISPANIC NEVER SMILES, DOESNT GREET OR SAY T.Y. HORRIBLE WORKER !! GET RID OF HIM OR SHUT PLACE DOWN
Avocado eggs toast is really delicious. I truly recommend the food is really good!
Delicious and fresh juices. The healthy glow was my drink of choice and I enjoyed it. I would recommend this spot for a healthy alternative.
Bad service
Coffee was amazing! It had soy milk and a little caramel. All for $1. I also tried the GLUTEN free banana bread. It was amazing!

We're so happy visiting this place!

Salmon rice bowl and Salas were amazing.

We defintively will come back! ü§ç
Ecxelente servicio y Su comida es excelente ü§©
Best food in The Bronx! üëçüëçüëç
Lots of options. Tasty
Came the last two days food is excellent good tasting healthy options
Overpriced basic food, my chips was missing with my burger

I ordered a plain sandwich. The guy didn‚Äôt follow instructions and put everything on it. Didn‚Äôt realize at first until I bit into it. Now I‚Äôm not feeling well because I was allergic to it and I‚Äôm gluten intolerant. I asked for him to redo it or refund since the order not what I asked for and cashier refused.
Muy bueno el personal
Great place to stay.
Food is amazing, great customer service and the healthy chocolate smoothie is really good i highly recommend
Juan and Jorge provided great service. The food was great. 10/10 recommended.
V√≠ctor is amazing! He took great care of me. Recommended healthy options and had a great vibe. I will definitely be back and recommend people I know!
Juano is a great server very knowledgeable and caring , great tasty smoothies
Good fresh food, cute place, nice staff.

It was my first time eating here.  Great fun soothing music and the staffs is extremely welcoming and helpful.  The guy offered to help with the selection and explained the variety of options to choose from.  I had a healthy tuna wrap and it was amazing!  I will be returning for more for sure!  Glad to have you nearby!

This spot is cute, clean, has delicious healthy food and coffee, and good wifi! I was cold and hungry and this place was warm refuge. Juan was super nice and personable and I had a really good vegan crispy chicken burger that tasted like real chicken. Highly recommended!
Very friendly and welcoming environment! Would definitely recommend!! Free coffee on your first order and the a√ßa√≠ bowls are good.

I‚Äôm a big juicer so I had to try this place. I ordered a green juice that was really good. I met Juano who was very nice and did a great job suggesting juices for me. The price is reasonable at around $7.50 for a small juice. Next time I return I‚Äôll try the food as it looked good on the photos.

Soooo! I‚Äôm a chef by trade, a foodie and my grandsons are vegans! When I tell you, IT IS DELICIOUS!!! It‚Äôs difficult to get vegan food to taste right! This Juice Bar & Cafe GOT IT RIGHT!! A MUST TRY! Go now! Why are you still reading this? Go now!

Unbeknownst to me, I went to this place on the day of their grand opening and was their 5th customer! I wanted something quick so I went for their peanut butter oat chocolate chip cookies. They were SO fresh and soft!!! I believe I spoke to the manager and he said they come in fresh every single day. These cookies will melt in your mouth and are absolutely delicious for a healthy treat!!! So glad they are next door to my Dermatologist, I will surely be coming back!

Juan was an amazing worker that provided the best service. The Chicken Wrap and the Matcha drink were so good I felt so satisfied. This was a 10/10 experience and will be a regular customer from now on! So happy to have this option in our community :)

This place is great! The ambiance is very welcoming and charming. Amazing food and smoothies. Staff are extremely friendly, the service was delightful and very professional. I went today, I had the grilled chicken caesar wrap and it was very tasty and well prepared. Definitely recommend 10/10.
An amazing experience and Juan was amazing! The customer service will make you want to come again on top of the amazing food. I love the vibes and the welcoming atmosphere!! Love it
Favorite healthy uptown spot! Love their great GF selection! Wraps, smoothies, and baked goods are delicious. And everything is fresh and light.

So happy that Healthy in Dyckman is here in the neighborhood! The inside has a great, modern atmosphere.

The food was delicious and filling (and healthy!) ‚Äî my group got the Butterbean Bacon Sandwich, Crispy Chicken Sandwich, Almond Butter A√ßa√≠, plus a smoothie and two baked goods. Everyone really enjoyed what they got. Looking forward to coming back soon!

Absolutely love this place. The food is great, I especially love their healthy egg sandwich and their all berries smoothie. The ambience and the staff are incredible as well, especially Pedro. Thank you all üôèüèæ
Trying the spinach chicken wrap for the first time and it's very tasty, well seasoned and fresh ingredients! Would definitely recommend if you're trying to eat healthier.
Love this place. Great costumer service !! Food is delicious. My fav juices are the we run uptown, 463 goodness , & healthy glow.
Love this place i come and get some studying done from time to time. Great vibes the food is amazing the staff is fantastic!
So excited to finally have them in our neighborhood! Vegan and Gluten free options. Great food. Will be back again & again.  Supporting local businesses.
Stopped in today for a wrap and Juan was so friendly and accommodating! Thank you!! And the wrap was delicious!

Juices are superb, I have had the Healthy Fruit 10/10
Dyckman Run Club 10/10
If it wasn't for the Bronx 10/10
Sugar cinnamon donut was 10/10 so fresh!!!
Omg I went with my kids, friends and husband we have a great time good was delicious, and Pedro was super nice and cordial with us very attentive I love it here üôåüèæ
You made my Thanksgiving! I was looking for something healthy to drink and found this local neighborhood gem. I will definitely be back! Thank you Juan
Beautiful space with delicious smoothies. I really appreciate all the vegan options! Will have to come back to try more.
The food was really fresh!! Very healthy thank you so much!!
A gem in Riverdale great service and amazing food both vegan and regular always fresh and great tasting awesome staff 10/10 try an all berries thank me later

I stumbled upon this place and fell in luv with it instantly. The fresh juice was great so I went back the day after to try the food. The chicken salad sandwich (on gluten free bread)...delish. Dylan, my server is a friendly, courteous young man.
The place is clean, with a soft relaxing atmosphere.
Welcome to the neighbourhood and good luck. We need you!
Pedro created a warm and welcoming experience here , food was amazing drinks as well , everything was freshly made amazing experience!!!!

The Healthy in Dyckman Juice Bar is one of my new favorites! The variety of  food options available is mind boggling and I mean that in a good way. As someone who doesn‚Äôt eat dairy, I love it here. My favorite thing I‚Äôve tried so far is the Salmon rice bowl. It‚Äôs so healthy, delicious, filling, and well priced! The avocado toast with the eggs was hitting too! You must give this gem a try. Thanks Juan for your great service today.

The space is amazing! Juan was very pleasant and made great coffee and food. I enjoyed my time here. For context I love the Christian music it made my time go so smooth while working. This coffee shop is a gem.
